logic

Class Rookie

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Character
      • logic.Guard
        • logic.Rookie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestRookie

    public class Rookie
extends Guard
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy). This specific type does the Guard route without any interruptions, always forward.
    Author:
    Jo√£o Vieira, Susana Lima
